comments: had to take this class for a DEC requirement and i took her based on this rating and was very happy i did. The class is boring to be honest but it can get interesting b.c of all the debates, and you have to participate for a good grade. Shes a really easy grader, def recommend, not a super easy class but manageable, shes really nice
She is a very helpful teacher. Class gets boring sometimes, but it\'s very difficult with the material. She grades pretty fairly, more on the easy side. I would recommend her class to anyone.
Love her! She\'s so nice and a very fair grader. I found the subject material to be pretty boring, but that\'s not her fault. Definitely reccomended!
Really nice, and interesting. Easy A if you attend and participate. She\'s pretty cute too.

Very intelligent, hardworking, kind, and helpful. She taught us a new set of cognitive tools with which we can reason about the world around us. The things I learned through her teaching are truly invaluable. Awesome person and philosopher. Must take.

Overall,good professor. she taught me phi 104 in Spring\'08. an easy A class if you attend lectures and try doing the assigned hw(even if you don\'t get everything right). participation not mandatory. gives extra credits. recommend.
She is sooo sweet! She is always willing to help and always has a smile on her face. She grades extremely fair and makes the class so much better. Best teacher I have had in college thus far.
